description: Returns active insights, predictive insights, and resource hours analyzed in last hour.

parameters.name: AccountIds
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account. (string) ---

parameters.name: OrganizationalUnitIds
parameters.description: The ID of the organizational unit. (string) ---

nested_items.name: OpenReactiveInsights
nested_items.description: An integer that specifies the number of open reactive insights in your Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: OpenProactiveInsights
nested_items.description: An integer that specifies the number of open proactive insights in your Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: MetricsAnalyzed
nested_items.description: An integer that specifies the number of metrics that have been analyzed in your organization.

nested_items.name: ResourceHours
nested_items.description: The number of Amazon DevOps Guru resource analysis hours billed to the current Amazon Web Services account in the last hour.
